hibernate-mapping.query: select new org.mifos.application.checklist.util.valueobjects.CheckListMaster(checkList.checklistId ,checkListDetail.detailText) from org.mifos.application.checklist.util.valueobjects.CheckList checkList, org.mifos.application.checklist.util.valueobjects.CheckListDetail checkListDetail, org.mifos.application.accounts.util.valueobjects.AccountCheckList accountCheckList where checkList.checklistStatus=:checklistStatus and accountCheckList.accountStatusId=:accountStatus and accountCheckList.accountTypeId=:accountTypeId and accountCheckList.checkList.checklistId=checkList.checklistId and checkList.checklistId=checkListDetail.checkList.checklistId
